name: Flattube
description:
A flat design for YouTube inspired by google's material design. It supports the default and the dark theme of the new YouTube design.
This design is only there to support the new YouTube design and no entirely new design for YouTube.
obsoletion_message: Style doesn't work on site anymore.
additional_info:
When you find bugs please report them as No rating Change log
  • First release 1.0
    • Added design for masterhead searchbar
    • Added design for masterhead searchresults (dark mode)
    • Added design for scrollbar
    • Added colors for like and dislike buttons
    • Fixed guide offset
    by Ingrim4
  • Subscription Manager 1.0.1
    • Added colors for like and dislike buttons in comments
    • Change colors of toggle(checkbox) and subscribe button to be more clearly
    by Ingrim4
  • Scrollbar update 1.1
    • Added scrollbar design for firefox
    • Fixed subscription button style
    • Fixed scrollbar issue in chrome
    by Ingrim4
  • Bug fixes 1.1.1
    • Fixed subscription button style
    by Ingrim4
